<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/connectors/jobs/{id}/cancel"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



POST /jobs/\{id\}/cancel

Cancels a pending or in-progress job. Cannot cancel completed jobs.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
